# Zenlytic

BUSINESS INTELLIGENCE

Zenlytic is a business intelligence tool designed for e-commerce and direct-to-consumer brands. It offers self-serve analytics capabilities, allowing users to gain insights from their data without needing technical expertise. The platform features natural language querying, making it accessible for teams to generate reports and visualizations quickly.

## Zenlytic + MotherDuck

Zenlytic integrates with MotherDuck by leveraging MotherDuck's cloud data warehouse capabilities for efficient data storage and querying. This integration allows Zenlytic users to run complex analytical queries on large datasets stored in MotherDuck, utilizing DuckDB's high-performance SQL engine for fast and reliable data processing.
